sourceMeaningMnemonic: To make <radical>alcohol</radical> the <radical>key</radical> is to ferment it. But, if you ferment it a certain way, it will become <kanji>vinegar</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine making a bunch of vinegar. You use a key to change it from alcohol to vinegar, yum!
readingMnemonic: You are demonstrating this practice in front of an audience. You want them to take you seriously so you wear a <reading>su</reading>it (<ja>す</ja>). A very nice suit. Surely they will now believe that you can turn alcohol into <kanji>vinegar</kanji>.
readingInfo: Imagine yourself doing the same thing as before but you are now wearing a suit. Dang, you look good.
